SEARCH
Package Control

Class UsersManager

java.lang.Object
Control.UsersManager
public class UsersManager extends Object
control class to execute changes to movie-goer accounts used for sign up, get all registered accounts, and edit booking history of movie-goer
Since:
2022-11-13

    • createUser

      public static void createUser(String username, String password, String name, int phoneNumber, String email)
      used to sign up and store data of new user
      Parameters:
      username - username of new user
      password - password of new user
      name - name of new user
      phoneNumber - phone number of new user
      email - email of new user

    • readAllUsers

      public static ArrayList<UserAccount> readAllUsers()
      called when having to check through whole database of movie-goer accounts
      Returns:
      array list of object type UserAccount, which comprises of all registered movie-goer accounts

    • deleteUser

      public static void deleteUser(int index)
      to delete any specific user can be implemented in admin control panel for future improvements
      Parameters:
      index - index in array list of UserAccount that requires deletion

    • editBookingHistory

      public static void editBookingHistory(int index, Booking b)
      add to booking history associated to the user account
      Parameters:
      index - index in array list of UserAccount to which booking history needs edits to
      b - Booking object to be added to user account
